contentrichtext.text: {{Italic title prefixed|3}} Two ships of the [[United States Navy]] have borne the name '''USS ''Perch''''', named in honor of the [[perch]], a type of fresh-water spiny-finned fish belonging to the family [[Percidae]]. * The first [[USS Perch (SS-176)|''Perch'']], (SS-176), was a [[United States Porpoise class submarine|''Porpoise''-class]] [[submarine]], commissioned in 1936 and stricken in 1942. * The second [[USS Perch (SS-313)|''Perch'']], (SS-313), was a [[Balao class submarine|''Balao''-class]] submarine, commissioned in 1944 and stricken in 1971. {{Shipindex}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Perch}} [[Category:United States Navy ship names]]
